00288 void CnipolHists::PreFill()
00289 {
00290    char dName[256];
00291    char hName[256];
00292 
00293    set<UShort_t>::const_iterator iCh;
00294    set<UShort_t>::const_iterator iChB = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.begin();
00295    set<UShort_t>::const_iterator iChE = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.end();
00296 
00297    for (iCh=iChB; iCh!=iChE; ++iCh) {
00298 
00299       sprintf(dName, "channel%02d", *iCh);
00300       DrawObjContainer *oc = d.find(dName)->second;
00301 
00302       sprintf(hName, "hSpinVsDelim_ch%02d", *iCh);
00303       ((TH1*) oc->o[hName])->SetBins(gNDelimeters, 0, gNDelimeters, N_SPIN_STATES, -1.5, 1.5);
00304    }
00305 }

00309 void CnipolHists::Fill(ChannelEvent *ch)
00310 {
00311    UChar_t chId  = ch->GetChannelId();
00312    //UChar_t detId = ch->GetDetectorId();
00313    UChar_t bId = ch->GetBunchId() + 1;
00314 
00315    // by detector id
00316    //DrawObjContainer &sd1 = d["Kinema"];
00317 
00318    // fill these if only pass the carbon mass cut
00319    //((TH1F*) d["Kinema2"]->o["energy_spectrum_all"])->Fill( fabs(ch->GetMandelstamT()) );
00320    //sprintf(hName,"energy_spectrum_det%d", detId);
00321    //((TH1F*) d["Kinema2"]->o[hName])->Fill( fabs(ch->GetMandelstamT()) );
00322 
00323    // by channel id
00324    //string sChId("  ");
00325    //sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", chId);
00326 
00327    //DrawObjContainer *sd = d.find("channel" + sChId)->second;
00328 
00329    string   sSS = gRunConfig.AsString( gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bId) );
00330    UShort_t nSS = gRunConfig.AsIndex(  gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bId) );
00331 
00332    // Full kinematic carbon kinEnergy
00333    Float_t depEnergy    = ch->GetEnergyA();
00334    //Float_t kinEnergyEst = ch->GetKinEnergyAEstimate();
00335    //Float_t kinEnergyEst = ch->GetKinEnergyAEstimateEDepend();
00336    //Float_t kinEnergy = ch->GetKinEnergyA();
00337    Float_t kinEnergy    = ch->GetKinEnergyAEDepend();
00338    Float_t timeDiff     = ch->GetTdcAdcTimeDiff();
00339 
00340    //Float_t tofEst    = ch->GetTimeOfFlightEstimate();
00341    Float_t tof       = ch->GetTimeOfFlight();
00342 
00343    //((TH1*) o.find("hKinEnergyA_o")->second) -> Fill(kinEnergy);
00344    //((TH1*) sd->o.find("hTimeVsEnergyA_ch" + sChId)->second) -> Fill(depEnergy, ch->GetTime());
00345    //((TH2*) sd->o.find("hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch" + sChId)->second) -> Fill(kinEnergy, tof);
00346    //((TH2*) sd->o.find("hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch" + sChId + "_" + sSS)->second) -> Fill(kinEnergy, tof);
00347    //((TH2*) sd->o.find("hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch" + sChId + "_" + sSS)->second) -> Fill(depEnergy, timeDiff);
00348 
00349    fhKinEnergyA_o  -> Fill(kinEnergy);
00350    fhSpinVsChannel -> Fill(chId, gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bId));
00351    fhSpinVsBunch   -> Fill(bId,  gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bId));
00352 
00353    fhTimeVsEnergyA_ch[chId-1] -> Fill(depEnergy, ch->GetTime());
00354    //fhTofVsKinEnergyA_ch[chId-1] -> Fill(kinEnergy, tof);
00355 
00356    fhTofVsKinEnergyA_ch_ss[chId-1][nSS]        -> Fill(kinEnergy, tof);
00357    fhLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch_ss[chId-1][nSS] -> Fill(depEnergy, timeDiff);
00358 
00359    //ds XXX
00360    //UShort_t tstep = 0;
00361 
00362    //if (gMeasInfo->Run == 5) {
00363    //   tstep = ch->GetDelimiterId();
00364    //   //NDcounts[(int)(st/12)][event->bid][TgtIndex[delim]]++;
00365    //} else if (gMeasInfo->Run >= 6) {
00366    //   UInt_t ttime = ch->GetRevolutionId()/RHIC_REVOLUTION_FREQ;
00367 
00368    //   if (ttime < MAXDELIM) {
00369    //      tstep = TgtIndex[ttime];
00370    //      //++cntr.good[TgtIndex[ttime]];
00371    //      //NDcounts[(int)(st/12)][event->bid][TgtIndex[ttime]]++;

00404 
00406 void CnipolHists::FillDerived()
00407 {
00408    Info("FillDerived", "Starting...");
00409 
00410    // Fill derivative histograms
00411    TH1* hKinEnergyA      = (TH1*) o["hKinEnergyA"];
00412    TH2* hTimeVsEnergyA   = (TH2*) o["hTimeVsEnergyA"];
00413    TH2* hTofVsKinEnergyA = (TH2*) o["hTofVsKinEnergyA"];
00414    TH1* hEventsVsChannel = (TH1*) o["hEventsVsChannel"];
00415 
00416    TH2* hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA     = (TH2*) o["hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA"];
00417    TH1* hLongiTimeDiff              = (TH1*) o["hLongiTimeDiff"];
00418    
00419    set<UShort_t>::const_iterator iCh;
00420    set<UShort_t>::const_iterator iChB = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.begin();
00421    set<UShort_t>::const_iterator iChE = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.end();
00422 
00423    for (iCh=iChB; iCh!=iChE; ++iCh)
00424    {
00425       string sChId("  ");
00426       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", *iCh);
00427 
00428       DrawObjContainer *oc = d.find("channel" + sChId)->second;
00429 
00430       // now loop over spin states and add up histograms
00431       TH2* hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch        = (TH2*) oc->o["hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch" + sChId];
00432       //TH2* hTofVsKinEnergyA_test_ch   = (TH2*) oc->o["hTofVsKinEnergyA_test_ch" + sChId];
00433       TH2* hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch = (TH2*) oc->o["hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch" + sChId];
00434 
00435       SpinStateSetIter iSS = gRunConfig.fSpinStates.begin();
00436 
00437       for (; iSS!=gRunConfig.fSpinStates.end(); ++iSS) {
00438    
00439          string sSS = gRunConfig.AsString(*iSS);
00440 
00441          TH2* hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch_ss = (TH2*) oc->o["hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch" + sChId + "_" + sSS];
00442          hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch->Add(hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch_ss);
00443 
00444          TH2* hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch_ss = (TH2*) oc->o["hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch" + sChId + "_" + sSS];
00445          hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch->Add(hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch_ss);
00446       }
00447 
00448       TH2* hTimeVsEnergyA_ch = (TH2*) oc->o["hTimeVsEnergyA_ch" + sChId];
00449       hTimeVsEnergyA->Add(hTimeVsEnergyA_ch);
00450 
00451       hTofVsKinEnergyA->Add(hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch);
00452 
00453       // Fill final kinematic histograms using calib constants
00454       //TH2* hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch = (TH2*) oc->o["hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch"+sChId];
00455       //ConvertRawToKin(hTVsA_ch, hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch, *iCh);
00456 
00457       hEventsVsChannel->SetBinContent(*iCh, hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch->GetEntries());
00458      
00459       // Fill hKinEnergyA as a projection of hTofVsKinEnergyA
00460       TH1*  hKinEnergyA_ch = (TH1*) oc->o["hKinEnergyA_ch" + sChId];
00461       TH1D* hProjTmp       = hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch->ProjectionX();
00462       utils::CopyBinContentError(hProjTmp, hKinEnergyA_ch);
00463       hKinEnergyA->Add(hKinEnergyA_ch);
00464 
00465       TH1* hLongiTimeDiff_ch = (TH1*) oc->o["hLongiTimeDiff_ch" + sChId];
00466       hProjTmp = hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch->ProjectionY();
00467       hLongiTimeDiff_ch->Add(hProjTmp);
00468 
00469       hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA->Add(hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch);
00470 
00471       hLongiTimeDiff->Add(hLongiTimeDiff_ch);
00472    }
00473 }
00474 
00475 
00477 void CnipolHists::PostFill()
00478 {
00479    Info("PostFill", "Starting...");
00480 
00481    // Fit energy slope with an exponential func
00482    TF1 *fitfunc = new TF1("fitfunc", "expo", 450, 850);
00483 
00484    //fitfunc->SetParNames("slope");
00485    fitfunc->SetParameter(0, 0);
00486    fitfunc->SetParameter(1, 0);
00487    fitfunc->SetParLimits(1, -1, 1);
00488 
00489    TH1* hKinEnergyA = (TH1*) o["hKinEnergyA"];
00490       
00491    if (hKinEnergyA->Integral() <= 0) {
00492       Error("PostFill", "Kin. energy distribution is empty");
00493       return;
00494    }
00495 
00496    TFitResultPtr fitres = hKinEnergyA->Fit("fitfunc", "M E S R");
00497 
00498    if ( fitres.Get() && fitres->Ndf()) {
00499       gAnaMeasResult->fFitResEnergySlope = fitres;
00500    } else {
00501       Error("PostFill", "Something is wrong with energy slope fit");
00502       hKinEnergyA->GetListOfFunctions()->Clear();
00503    }
00504 
00505    delete fitfunc;
00506 
00507    // Fit channel histograms
00508    ChannelSetIter iCh = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.begin();
00509 
00510    for (; iCh!=gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.end(); ++iCh) {
00511 
00512       string sChId("  ");
00513       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", *iCh);
00514 
00515       DrawObjContainer *oc = d.find("channel"+sChId)->second;
00516 
00517       TH1* hKinEnergyA_ch = (TH1*) oc->o["hKinEnergyA_ch" + sChId];
00518       
00519       if (hKinEnergyA_ch->Integral() <= 0) {
00520          Error("PostFill", "Kin. energy distribution for channel %s is empty", sChId.c_str());
00521          continue;
00522       }
00523 
00524       TF1 *fitfunc = new TF1("fitfunc", "expo", 450, 850);
00525 
00526       fitfunc->SetParameter(0, 0);
00527       fitfunc->SetParameter(1, 0);
00528       fitfunc->SetParLimits(1, -1, 1);
00529 
00530       TFitResultPtr fitres = hKinEnergyA_ch->Fit("fitfunc", "M E S R");
00531 
00532       if ( fitres.Get() && fitres->Ndf()) {
00533          // do nothing yet
00534       } else {
00535          Error("PostFill", "Something is wrong with energy slope fit for channel %s", sChId.c_str());
00536          hKinEnergyA_ch->GetListOfFunctions()->Clear();
00537       }
00538 
00539       delete fitfunc;
00540    }
00541 }

00545 void CnipolHists::SaveAllAs(ImageFormat fmt_ext, TCanvas &c, std::string pattern, string path, Bool_t thumbs)
00546 {
00547    //Info("SaveAllAs", "executing...");
00548    DrawObjContainer::SaveAllAs(fmt_ext, c, pattern, path, thumbs);
00549 
00550    //ds XXX
00551    return;
00552 
00553    string strThumb = thumbs ? "_thumb" : "" ;
00554 
00555    // Draw superimposed for all channels
00556    set<UShort_t>::const_iterator iCh;
00557    set<UShort_t>::const_iterator iChB = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.begin();
00558    set<UShort_t>::const_iterator iChE = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.end();
00559 
00560    for (iCh=iChB; iCh!=iChE; ++iCh)
00561    {
00562       string sSi("  ");
00563       sprintf(&sSi[0], "%02d", *iCh);
00564       string dName = "channel" + sSi;
00565       string cName = "c_combo_ch" + sSi + strThumb;
00566 
00567       DrawObjContainer* oc = d.find(dName)->second;
00568 
00569       THStack hstack(cName.c_str(), cName.c_str());
00570 
00571       TH1* h1 = (TH1*) oc->o["hTimeVsEnergyA_ch" + sSi];
00572       hstack.Add(h1);
00573 
00574       TH1* h2 = (TH1*) oc->o["hFitMeanTimeVsEnergyA_ch" + sSi];
00575       hstack.Add(h2);
00576 
00577       string subPath = path + "/" + dName;
00578 
00579       SaveHStackAs(c, hstack, subPath);
00580       //DrawObjContainer::SaveHStackAs(c, hstack, subPath);
00581    }
00582 }
00583 
00584 
00586 void CnipolHists::ConvertRawToKin(TH2* hRaw, TH2* hKin, UShort_t chId)
00587 {
00588    for (Int_t ibx=0; ibx<=hRaw->GetNbinsX(); ++ibx) {
00589       for (Int_t iby=0; iby<=hRaw->GetNbinsY(); ++iby) {
00590 
00591          Double_t bcont  = hRaw->GetBinContent(ibx, iby);
00592          Double_t bAdc   = hRaw->GetXaxis()->GetBinCenter(ibx);
00593          Double_t bTdc   = hRaw->GetYaxis()->GetBinCenter(iby);
00594 
00595          Double_t kinE   = gAsymRoot->fEventConfig->fCalibrator->GetEnergyA(bAdc, chId);
00596          Double_t kinToF = gAsymRoot->fEventConfig->fCalibrator->GetTimeOfFlight(bTdc, chId);
00597          
00598          //Int_t bin = hKin->FindBin(kinE, kinToF);
00599          hKin->Fill(kinE, kinToF, bcont);
00600       }
00601    }
00602 }
